title: Muir Woods National Monument: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park       There are many ways in which you can support Muir Woods National Monument. You can become a volunteer for Muir Woods National Monument or the Native Plant Nursery; visit our bookstore, gift shop and caf√©; learn more about the Leave No Trace practices for your visit here or at other parks; or simply come and enjoy the magnificent old-growth redwood forest and walk beneath the coast redwood trees. Golden Gate National Parks Conservancy The Golden Gate National Parks Conservancy is a nonprofit membership organization created to:  Preserve the Golden Gate National Parks, Enhance the experiences of park visitors, and Build a community dedicated to conserving the parks for the future.  The Conservancy's work is undertaken with generous contributions from individual, corporate and foundation donors, as well as income earned from operating park bookstores, merchandise and retail, publishing educational materials and providing interpretive tours.  Become a member of the Parks Conservancy. Purchase books from the Conservancy.  Volunteering If you would prefer to donate your time and expertise rather than funding:   Become a Volunteers in Parks (VIP).   Become a steward by volunteering for the Native Plant Nursery, part of the Golden Gate National Parks Conservancy.
